summary.span: 指定带有 DSA 算法系列的签名的数据格式。

span.span: Specifies the data format for signatures with the DSA family of algorithms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > DSA 算法的创建者已经撤销了对它的支持。The creators of the DSA algorithm have withdrawn their support for it. 请考虑使用类 或 类而不是 类。Consider using the class or the class instead of the class. 仅用于与旧版应用程序和数据兼容。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data.

summary.span: IEEE P1363 中的签名格式，这会为给定密钥生成固定大小的签名。

span.span: The signature format from IEEE P1363, which produces a fixed size signature for a given key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此签名格式将 `(r, s)` 元组编码为大字节序表示形式的串联和的 `r` 大字节序表示形式 `s` ，每个值使用编码关键字的数学字段中的最大整数值所需的字节数进行编码。This signature format encodes the `(r, s)` tuple as the concatenation of the big-endian representation of `r` and the big-endian representation of `s`, each value encoding using the number of bytes required for encoding the maximum integer value in the key's mathematical field. 例如，曲线的 ECDSA 签名 `secp521r1` （521位字段）将每个和的编码 `r` `s` 为66个字节，从而生成一个132字节的签名输出。For example, an ECDSA signature from the curve `secp521r1`, a 521-bit field, will encode each of `r` and `s` as 66 bytes, producing a signature output of 132 bytes.

summary.span: IETF RFC 3279 中的签名格式，这会生成大小不定的签名。

span.span: The signature format from IETF RFC 3279, which produces a variably-sized signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此签名格式将 `(r, s)` 元组编码为的 DER 编码 `SEQUENCE(INTEGER(r), INTEGER(s))` 。This signature format encodes the `(r, s)` tuple as the DER encoding of `SEQUENCE(INTEGER(r), INTEGER(s))`. 由于 DER 整数编码的长度根据要编码的值而异，因此此签名格式不会生成一致的签名长度。Because the length of a DER INTEGER encoding varies according to the value being encoded, this signature format does not produce a consistent signature length. 采用此格式的签名始终以开头 `0x30` ，并且平均比格式的签名长7个字节 。Signatures in this format always start with `0x30`, and on average are 7 bytes longer than signatures in the format.
